title: Gladiator Star Reclaims Birth Name Amid Personal Changes
summary: Jamie Christian-Johal, known as Giant on the BBC's Gladiators reboot, has announced he will revert to his birth surname, Bigg, in 2026. The decision stems from personal experiences, including a recent divorce and an ADHD diagnosis, which have prompted him to seek greater authenticity. A former professional bodybuilder and firefighter from Ilkeston, Derbyshire, Jamie has gained popularity on the show since its 2024 return. He explained on Instagram that he lost his original identity at age four when his surname changed, and he later hid behind his physique and a double-barrelled surname. Now, he aims to move forward with transparency, addressing his ADHD journey and fitness goals while being a better father and human. Currently, he stars in a production of Jack and the Beanstalk in Chesterfield, maintaining his large physique with a high-calorie diet.
